name: Chaos à la Maison
overview: Chaos at Home has given us a rather good surprise: offering a rather successful cartoon atmosphere, the game could very well have pulled out of the game through the mass of party-games that come out on Wii. Unfortunately, it does not offer enough content to win against the competition: it will take you less than two hours to go around the 17 mini-games offered which however remain quite nice for two players.
